Eric Moe

Merry Xmas from Moe!

Tribute to the polar bear plunge.—31 December 2016

Happy (insert winter holiday here) from your friend Eric Moe! This year I designed a Christmas postcard I sent to friends and family. Lots of positive feedback and holiday wishes, but a few people asked me who I hired to illustrate my card (🙄). This was a quick one— I submitted the design for print and sent out my physical copies within a week of Christmas. I am posting it today because my illustration of the Barton Springs Polar Bear Plunge happens tomorrow! If you want to see me participate, check out @geomoetric for the winter shenanigans.

Wanna share?
